title: Cherry H-3 Nozzlenose
paragraphs: The Cherry H-3 Nozzlenose is a main weapon in Splatoon and Splatoon 2. It is a Sheldon's Picks-branded variant of the H-3 Nozzlenose and comes with a different sub and special.

The Cherry H-3 Nozzlenose shares its overall design with the H-3 Nozzlenose. However, the hose of the Cherry H-3 Nozzlenose is slightly darker and is wrapped differently, the reel and nozzle use red and pink tones, and there is a decal of a pair of cherries on the hose.
The Cherry H-3 Nozzlenose was released on 8 June 2016 as part of Sheldon's Picks Volume 2. It comes with the Splash Wall and the Bubbler.
- An Inkling girl holds the Cherry H-3 Nozzlenose.
- Firing the Cherry H-3 Nozzlenose through a grate.
- Using the C'mon!(NA) / To Me!(EU/OC) Signal.
The Cherry H-3 Nozzlenose was released on 3 April 2019 at 01:00 UTC as part of version 4.6.0.[3] It comes with the Splash Wall and the Bubble Blower.
For competitive tips about the Cherry H-3 Nozzlenose

- The Cherry H-3 Nozzlenose is one of only three weapons to be unlocked simultaneously with an alternate kit, the H-3 Nozzlenose D. The other pairs are the Clash Blaster and its Neo variant, and the E-liter 4K Scope and its Custom variant.
- The Cherry H-3 Nozzlenose's cherry decal can also be seen on the "cherry mug" locker decoration in Splatoon 3.
